name: Traffic - a comic gamebook
description:
Traffic is an interactive graphic novel that aims to entertain while raising awareness towards the issues of human traffic in Europe.

This game was made in 48 hours for the Game Changer Game Jam in Aarhus, Denmark, from the 2nd to the 4th of May of 2014.

I came to the jam with an idea that his would be a unique game jam, since the theme was aligned with the 'games for change' movement. I knew an NGO  was invited to present their cause, so I went to the jam with the goal of developing a game (digital or analog) that would solve a problem they had. After Hope Now's lecture, I decided to make an analog game, a low-cost game that could raise awareness towards the NGO's cause and that could at the same time be easily accessible in poor countries if the production cost (0.50 cent to 2.5 Euro, or 2 to 10 Danish Crowns per unit) is sponsored.
